About Moises Auto Body & Paint

Welcome to Moises Auto Body & Paint! With over 20 years of experience in the auto body industry, we pride ourselves on delivering high-quality services to our customers. Our skilled technicians are dedicated to restoring your vehicle to its original condition.

Our Services

  • Auto Painting
  • Car Detailing
  • Custom Paint
  • Dent Removal
  • Paintless Dent Removal
  • Rust Removal
  • Bumper Repair
  • Collision Repair
  • Frame Alignment
  • Frame Straightening

Payment Options

We accept various payment methods including cash, credit cards, and insurance claims.

Languages Spoken

Our team is fluent in English and Spanish, ensuring clear communication with all our customers.
